# videoRect

**Instance Property**

The current size and position of the video image that displays within the layer’s bounds.

## Declaration

```swift
var videoRect: CGRect { get }
```

## Discussion

The size and position of a rectangle depends on the aspect ratio of the media (16:9 or 4:3), the layer’s [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayer/bounds], and the value of its [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerLayer/videoGravity] property.

This property is key-value observable.

## Configuring the presentation

- **videoGravity**: A value that specifies how the layer displays the player’s visual content within the layer’s bounds.
- **AVLayerVideoGravity**: A structure that defines how a layer displays a player’s visual content within the layer’s bounds.
